title: My Google pixel 2 device stopped working. When I turn it on it just play the open screen of Google l
content: My Google pixel 2 device stopped working. When I turn it on it just play the open screen of Google logo and keep playing the opening screen till the battery is finished. And this the second time I faces such a problem with your purchases. First time with my Google pixel one and I called you but you didn't do anything for me!!
